group_1.narration: —Ayame—@Hazuki, Hazuki!@Can I break the eggs yet?!
—Hazuki—@Sure, I'll leave it to you.@Could you separate them into the bowl over there?
—Hazuki—@Ah, but be careful to not get any shell in there.
—Hazuki—@But I'm on cooking duty today, so let me make it.

group_1.textRight: [chara:302801:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Ahhhh...! It was delicious!@Hazuki's cooking is the best...!

group_1.textLeft: Um, what about my cooking...?

group_1.textRight: And your food's edible...!@More than before...

group_1.textLeft: More than before...

group_1.textRight: Now, now, we all have our strengths@and weaknesses.
You've got a long life ahead of you.@You'll get better at it.
Oh, yeah, yeah! That's what I was@tryin' to say!

group_1.textLeft: You're sure in a good mood, Ayame...

group_1.textRight: ...Konoha?

group_1.textLeft: You know, there's something I wanted to@tell both of you...

group_1.textRight: What is it?

group_1.textLeft: I think we talked about this a little bit before,@but...
I think that in the future...there will be many@children in the same circumstances as us...
I'd like to do a job where I can help them,@and people who are trying to help others.
So...
I think...it'd be nice to be like the director...
...I-I knew it, it's weird, isn't it?
Even though all this time, I've been talking about@doing things for all of our sakes...
I can't believe I'm being so selfish all of a sudden...

group_1.textRight: Konoha!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:302601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textRight: Here! In that case, read this!

group_1.textLeft: ...Ah...that book, "Career Studies for Middle and@High School Students"...!

group_1.textRight: Lemme see, what's a good job for@workin' with kids...
Hmmm...[chara:302801:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:302801:cheek_0][chara:302801:motion_200][chara:302801:lipSynch_1]oh! Whaddabout this?!
It says "child guide-ants count-soul-ler"!

group_1.textLeft: Child guidance counselor...like the people at@the Azalea House.
That might be rather nice...

group_1.textRight: Did I help?!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, you did very well, Ayame.

group_1.textRight: Hee hee!
...Can I tell you somethin', too?@What I wanna do when I grow up...

group_1.textLeft: Certainly, would you tell me?

group_1.textRight: See, I wanna do this! Somethin' called@a "body-guard"!
It's an easy word to read!

group_1.textLeft: Yup, sounds just like your "buddyguarding," huh?

group_1.textRight: It feels good protectin' someone and@hearing 'em thank me for it!
Plus, I can protect you two, right?!

group_1.textLeft: Ayame...
When did you become so dependable...

group_1.textRight: I know, right?!
Then, I guess it's my turn now.

group_1.textLeft: Have you also decided what exactly you@want to do, Hazuki?

group_1.textRight: Yeah... I want to reform the environment for@orphans like us.
Uhhh...what does that mean you're gonna do?

group_1.textLeft: I want to create a system where@children can live happily.

group_1.textRight: Then...you're buildin' a new Azalea House?

group_1.textLeft: That'd be great, but I want to change@the rules themselves.
I guess you could say a "politician"@or something like that?
But I'm not suited to working in the public eye.
I'd be happy to support someone who can@change the system from behind the scenes.

group_1.textRight: Manipulatin' things behind the scenes is@your specialty!

group_1.textLeft: Couldn't you have found a better way to@phrase that?
*Giggle*...

group_1.narration: When we started working@as bodyguards for Magical Girls,@we promised to change the way we lived our lives,@and we became involved with others.

In the process, we learned about the lives of@others our age, both as Magical Girls and as people.@We began to think about not only what we wanted for@the three of us, but what we wanted as individuals...
There were times when I thought that@considering my own dreams was@a betrayal to Hazuki and Ayame,@but now I understand...
The dreams we've found will surely become@new hope for each of us to survive...

group_1.textLeft: Hey, can we make one more promise?
The three of us will always support each other...@...and make our dreams come true.

group_1.textCenter: Sounds good. Let's call today the start of@a new chapter in our lives!

group_1.textRight: Yeah! We gotta work super hard again!

group_1.textLeft: Then...it's a promise.

group_1.narration: As Magical Girls, and as individual human beings...@This marks the beginning of our dreams@that will build upon each other for our futures to come...
